text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxBusiness What the rest of us sane and normal people understand about this bs “obamagate” is that you are trying to discredit Biden, are lashing out at someone far and away better than you because you fear him and are trying to deflect from your inept response to covid19 that has kill 92k
